author: Pálmi F
title: Good hotel, excellent location
text:
Despite the hotel is a bit out from the city center of Paris, the location is excellent as the Metro is only 5 minutes walk from the hotel and the train takes you straight into the city, along the Champs-Élysées, past the Arc de Triomphe and Louvre Museum. The La Defence is very friendly towards pedestrian traffic as it is all built on ramps and walkways so one never has to deal with the motorized traffic. The hotel is clean and modern and offers a good breakfast at a good price and also a so called "City breakfast" for those not wanting to eat that much in the morning. The hotel also offers a room service 24/7 in case someone wishes to have meals delivered to the rooms. The staff is very friendly and I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good hotel with an excellent location at a fair price.
Room Tip: If possible ask for a room with view over the river Seine See more room tips
